version_description: Minor bug fixes
Added support to export collected surge data as a CSV.  You can find this under the Setting menu.
Fixes problem with Exporting Data on iPad and fixes crash when trying to export data with no fixed locations.
Various bug fixes
Includes fixes for poor performance on launch and during app use.
Various bug fixes
This version adds support for Referral Rewards. As a Premium User, you will now be able to earn rewards by referring new Premium Members. See details under Settings->Referral Rewards.
Stability and bug fixes
Fixes crash related to changes to the Uber API
Added support to minimize the graph and made the in app notifications have the same look as system notifications.
Stability and bug fixes
Uber has forced us to remove support for multiple locations and historic data. Starting with this version, you will only be able to track the surge at your current location.

***Uber has forced us to remove support for multiple locations and historic data. You will only be able to track the surge at your current location***

This version includes minor bug fixes.

***Uber has forced us to remove support for viewing multiple locations at the same time and historic data.***

You can now change the "active location" from your current position to any other location, allowing you to monitor other areas.

***Uber has forced us to remove support for viewing multiple locations at the same time and historic data.***

Fixed crash when entering a promo code.

***Uber has forced us to remove support for viewing multiple locations at the same time and historic data.***

Notifications for surge start/increase, surge decrease, and surge end now each have their own sound.

***Uber has forced us to remove support for viewing multiple locations at the same time and historic data.***

Bug fixes.

***Uber has forced us to remove support for viewing multiple locations at the same time and historic data.***

Updated to support iOS 10
- Notifications update with new data, rather than generating separate notifications.
- Today Widget has been updated with new iOS 10 look and feel.
- Various bug fixes.

***Uber has forced us to remove support for viewing multiple locations at the same time and historic data.***

Stability Fixes.

***Uber has forced us to remove support for viewing multiple locations at the same time and historic data.***

More stability fixes.
Stability fixes.
Bug fixes.
Improved sign in error handling.

Fix issue with sign in infinite spinner and surges not updating.

*** If you are still encountering the infinite spinner on launch, use the "Force Account Sign Out" option in the Surge settings in the Settings App.
- Updates for iOS 11

- More updates for iOS 11 and iPhone X
- Various bug fixes

- Updates for iOS 13
- Many bug fixes
- Stability fixes for the Today Widget

- Fixed sign in issue
- iOS 11 is now the minimum version supported
